meanings.definition: Items made of brass, such as utensils or decorative objects.
meanings.sent1: I polished the brasswares on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of brasswares for home decor.
meanings.sent3: The brasswares on the table gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of brasswares shone like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The brasswares clinked softly as she arranged them.

meanings.definition: The trade or industry of producing goods made of brass.
meanings.sent1: He worked in the brasswares industry for many years.
meanings.sent2: The town's economy thrived on brasswares production.
meanings.sent3: The brasswares business was booming with new designs.
meanings.sent4: In the world of brasswares, quality craftsmanship is key.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers echoed in the brasswares workshop.

meanings.definition: The collection or display of brass items.
meanings.sent1: Her brasswares collection included antique pieces.
meanings.sent2: The museum showcased a stunning array of brasswares.
meanings.sent3: He admired the brasswares exhibit with fascination.
meanings.sent4: The brasswares display caught the eye of every visitor.
meanings.sent5: The brasswares collection sparkled under the museum lights.
